entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry is a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: A person who is opening the silk sack and offering it to Fleur Delacour.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, Fleur is one of the participants in a competition.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: The headmistress of Beauxbatons Academy, Madame Maxime has told Fleur what was coming.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, Krum is one of the participants in a competition.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, Cedric is one of the participants in a competition.

entities.name: welsh green
entities.description: A type of dragon that Fleur draws out of the bag.

entities.name: chinese fireball
entities.description: A type of dragon that Krum draws out of the bag.

entities.name: swedish short-snout
entities.description: A type of dragon that Cedric draws out of the bag.

entities.name: hungarian horntail
entities.description: The type of dragon that Harry draws out of the bag.

relationships.description: Harry knew that Fleur had been told what was coming by Madame Maxime.
Harry also knew that Krum had been told what was coming.
Bagman offered the silk sack to Fleur Delacour.
Cedric pulled out the Swedish Short-Snout from the bag.
Harry pulled out the Hungarian Horntail from the bag.
